attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: Flocks of Guntherâ€™s flying monsters descend upon the enemy, ripping and tearing before they get a chance to react.

effects.description:
Leadership: +15 for all Flying units
	(all units in army)

Ability number of uses: +1 for all Dragon Breath attacks
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A single swing from Guntherâ€™s greatsword cleaves through dozens of whole bodies.
Though deception is common amongst Vampires, Gunther is especially devious and treacherous, like the von Carsteins of old.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +35% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: The combination of his heavy suit of armour and his massive stature enables Gunther to effortlessly stand his ground against charges from larger foes.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Gunther always has a flock of bats scouting the local area for any traps, making it almost impossible to catch him off guard.

effects.description: This character becomes able to see enemies hiding in forest regardless of distance

Hero self-defence: +50% chance of wounding aggressors
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

items.colour_text: The Sweeping Razor, a sturdy flamberge made of various metals, is the primary weapon of the Vampire Lord, Gunther von Grecht.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for all Flying units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: +5% for all Flying units
	(Hero's army)

items.colour_text: A suit of black hardened-steel armour crafted by a Drakenhof blacksmith, made for Guntherâ€™s larger stature.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for all Flying units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: +5% for all Flying units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Gunther von Grecht commands the aerial forces of Mannfredâ€™s legion. Mounted atop his Zombie Dragon, he leads the monstrous volitants to accomplish his lordâ€™s goals.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

Weapon Damage: +10 for all Flying units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: +25% for all Flying units
	(Hero's army)
